msbt.message: You learn a lot about folks by checking out their interior- design choices! <20_2 arg="10" />How you position stuff, what kind of decorations you choose<20_3 arg="6" />it tells me EVERYTHING!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So this is where you sleep? Innnnnnnnteresting!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Did you know a person's bed says a LOT about them? My bed says, "Oh? Not sleeping on the couch tonight?"
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Do you watch a lot of TV, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I watch music shows, but the rest of the time <20_2 arg="6" />my TV's only used for VIDEO GAMES!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Music is, you know, my life!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm really into listening to music while I take a bath. Get some good scrubbing tunes and sing along!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's already ?! Wow. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We've been having so much fun, I so did not even see what time it was!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, a plant! A live one! Do you have a green thumb?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />My plants always die If you only counted my green thumbs, I wouldn't have any thumbs at all!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I L-O-V-E LOVE your bathtub! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What a great spot to, like, relax and talk to a rubber duck about life.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your your fave, ? I ADORE the shape!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The balance of functionality and, um, style proves your haute taste!
Your <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> seems comfy, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I always choose my chairs based on cuteness, so a lot of them turn out to be suuuupes uncomfortable.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! You can play the ?We should put on a show sometime!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Do you cook, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I usually just eat whatever takes the least work. Cleaning dishes is the worst!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, you have ! Is it for, like, staying healthy?I should get one of those and pose on it. It'd be a fab album cover!

<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa, you have <20_2 arg="9" />?<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you like outdoorsy stuff?Me too! I'm so about things like barbecuing and camping and getting bitten by bugs!Give me a ring next time you do any stuff like that, 'K?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That it sure does put off some cool accent lighting! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It makes everything in this room look 10 times more awesome!Well, except you and me. We ALWAYS look this awesome, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="3" />This <20_2 arg="9" /> is where you put your look together, isn't it? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, let me just saythere's something magical happening here, because you always look fab! Hmmmaybe I should get one of these for myself, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This it holds all your most fashionable clothing and accessories, amiright? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So, like, would it be rude if I told you I was dying to take a peek at what you have in there, ? It's not that I want to copy all your fresh fashion ideas, it's just thatOh, who am I kidding. I totes want to copy your entire look! It's just so ME, if you know what I mean.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ohmigosh! Is that your ADORBS ? I love, love, LOVE it, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If it's cool with you, I'm going to come back and visit it sometime. Eh, I'll, like, visit you too.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice. I see you got yourself .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Fish make totes awesome roomies, I hear.They're quiet. They don't eat much. And they NEVER leave dirty dishes in the sink, !

<20_2 arg="10" />Your !<20_2 arg="9" />It just gave me a mega-fab idea for my debut concert!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Imagine how epic a fossil would look onstage! Like, giant dinosaur bones looming RIGHT over me while I sing! I could tell everyone it was a show 200 million years in the making, !

<20_2 arg="10" />Ohmigosh! <20_2 arg="9" />Is that, like, for real ? Wow. Just WOW! Check out those brushstrokes and, like, the colors and stuff.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yeah, I was going to become a famous painter oncebut painting is, like, WAY hard, ! So, yeah, I'll stick with being a famous pop star, thank you very much.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look at you! So SASSY with your home decor! I mean, you put in here! <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />Be honest. Was it expensive? It looks expensive. But totes WORTH IT, ! It gives your home a super-swank museum vibe. I could take selfies in here all day!

<20_2 arg="10" />Oh!<20_2 arg="9" /><10_4 /> I mean, oh WOW, I'm super into this of yours here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Unrelated question How do you feel about faux art? "Faux" means "fake," but, like, in a good way. Just curious. No reason.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean it! Being able to kick back in a nice cool room on a hot day is key to winning at life.I may be an up-and-coming diva, but I appreciate practical things too, .

<20_2 arg="10" />Ohmigosh!<20_2 arg="9" /> I can't believe you have
for a pet! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think it would mind if I took a selfie with it to show all my fans?Yeah, you're right. Coming from the ocean, it's probably not comfortable with the social-media thing yet.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is thatMY photo?! Le GASP! I knew it! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I knew you were one of my fans, !Wow. I'm in the presence of my biggest fan! I'd better not do anything weirdH-here I am. Acting WAY normal. Super, totes norm-norm. That's me. Yep. I, um IPHEW! That's exhausting. I guess there's just too much ME to keep bottled up, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />No way! I never thought you'd own !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love these things! Some folks might make fun of us for itbut once I'm famous, this will be SO trendy.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hold. Le. Phone. Do I spy ?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's so cool! That's so trendy! I'm gaga for it, !You HAVE to teach me your trendy design secrets sometime. Lemme peep that playbook, !

Your house is SO chill. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It must be .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'd unwind here all day if I could. HEY! Let's swap houses for a bit!You can redecorate my place with your ultra-fab styleand I can try on every outfit you own, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />WHOA! This is totes amazing! I've never seen anyone maintain their so well.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />My gadgets break SUPER fast but if I can't jazz up the insides with glitter, why even bother?
